001package ca.gc.cra.radar.infrastructure.metrics;
002
003import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.MetricsPort;
004
005/**
006 * Metrics adapter that discards all observations.
007 * <p>Thread-safe and stateless; useful for tests or disabled metrics.</p>
008 *
009 * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
010 */
011public final class NoOpMetricsAdapter implements MetricsPort {
012  /**
013   * Creates a no-op metrics adapter.
014   *
015   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
016   */
017  public NoOpMetricsAdapter() {}
018  /**
019   * Discards the increment request.
020   *
021   * @param key metric identifier; ignored
022   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
023   */
024  @Override
025  public void increment(String key) {}
026
027  /**
028   * Discards the observation.
029   *
030   * @param key metric identifier; ignored
031   * @param value observed value; ignored
032   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
033   */
034  @Override
035  public void observe(String key, long value) {}
036}
